languages.text: "Рассматривать гипотетические последствия несостоявшихся судилищ не могут быть представлены в качестве доказательства невиновности".
"The potential outcomes of trials that did not take place cannot be presented as evidence of innocence."
languages.original_text: "Рассматривать гипотетические последствия несостоявшихся судилищ не могут быть представлены в качестве доказательства невиновности".

traits.locale_text: "The potential outcomes of trials that did not take place cannot be presented as evidence of innocence."

"The potential outcomes of trials that did not take place cannot be presented as evidence of innocence."

languages.text: "Der mögliche Ausgang von Verhandlungen, die nie stattgefunden haben, kann nicht als Unschuldsbeweis herangezogen werden."
languages.original_text: "The potential outcomes of trials that did not take place cannot be presented as evidence of innocence."

traits.locale_text: "Der mögliche Ausgang von Verhandlungen, die nie stattgefunden haben, kann nicht als Unschuldsbeweis herangezogen werden."

languages.text: « L'issue potentielle de procès n'ayant jamais eu lieu ne peut être tenue comme une démonstration de l'innocence de l'{mf|accusé|accusée}. »
languages.original_text: "The potential outcomes of trials that did not take place cannot be presented as evidence of innocence."

traits.locale_text: « L'issue potentielle de procès n'ayant jamais eu lieu ne peut être tenue comme une démonstration de l'innocence de l'{mf|accusé|accusée}. »

languages.text: “尚未进行的审判可能发生的结果，无法作为证明无罪的证据。”
languages.original_text: "The potential outcomes of trials that did not take place cannot be presented as evidence of innocence."

traits.locale_text: “尚未进行的审判可能发生的结果，无法作为证明无罪的证据。”

languages.text: «Los posibles resultados de este juicio que no han llegado a suceder no pueden presentarse como prueba de inocencia».
languages.original_text: "The potential outcomes of trials that did not take place cannot be presented as evidence of innocence."

traits.locale_text: «Los posibles resultados de este juicio que no han llegado a suceder no pueden presentarse como prueba de inocencia».

languages.text: 「行われなかった裁判の可能性の結果を、無罪の証拠として提示することはできません」
languages.original_text: "The potential outcomes of trials that did not take place cannot be presented as evidence of innocence."

traits.locale_text: 「行われなかった裁判の可能性の結果を、無罪の証拠として提示することはできません」

languages.text: "Görülmemiş davaların olası sonuçlarından hareketle masumiyet iddiasında bulunulamaz."
languages.original_text: "The potential outcomes of trials that did not take place cannot be presented as evidence of innocence."

traits.locale_text: "Görülmemiş davaların olası sonuçlarından hareketle masumiyet iddiasında bulunulamaz."
